title: Bitcoin price holds above $62K as ETFs see record volumes
description:
Bitcoin price seesaws above $62,000 as U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs hit record net inflows and trading volumes on Wednesday.

Bitcoin price (BTC) surged briefly above $64,000 on Feb. 28 before retracing toward the $62,000 zone. This BTC price surge was accompanied by record volumes in spot Bitcoin ETFs and a spike in crypto liquidations. 

As of 3:35 pm UTC, the pioneer cryptocurrency was exchanging hands at $62,669, up 5% over the last 24 hours.

The latest rally has seen a 93% spike in BTC’s daily trading volume to $90.2 billion. Bitcoin’s market capitalization has increased to $1.23 billion, cementing its top spot as the most valuable cryptocurrency, according to the CoinMarketCap ranking table.

Read more

title: CNBC’s Brian Kelly Issues Imminent Bitcoin Price Warning, Says Two Altcoins May Benefit From BTC Reversal
description:
Investor Brian Kelly warns Bitcoin (BTC) may soon suffer a significant market correction after soaring into the $60,000 range.
